hero.title: Review your interface copy like a UX writer would
hero.subtitle: Make every word work for your users. Chordio reviews your interface copy for clarity, consistency, and tone.

ultimate-prd.title: Great UX writing makes products feel effortless
ultimate-prd.subtitle: Every word on a button, tooltip, or error message shapes how users move through your product

enhanced-prd-clarity.title: Check your copy against proven UX writing principles
enhanced-prd-clarity.subtitle: Chordio checks your designs against proven UX writing principles, helping you spot unclear phrasing, tone mismatches, and moments that break user flow.

wireframes.title: Clarity
wireframes.description: Write like you speak. Users shouldn't need to think twice. Catch phrases like 'Re-compute settings' that leave users unsure what happens next.

user-flows.title: Conciseness
user-flows.description: Keep it short. Every word should earn its place. Identify long tooltips or help text that explain more than they need to.

social-posts.title: Consistency
social-posts.description: Use the same terms and tone across screens. Spot when 'Delete' on one screen becomes 'Remove' on another â€” users hesitate.

simulated-reviews.title: Empathy
simulated-reviews.description: Anticipate confusion. Offer guidance, not blame. Transform 'You entered the wrong code' into 'That code didn't work. Try again.'

press-release.title: Action Orientation
press-release.description: Help users know what to do next. Replace vague buttons like 'Proceed' with clear ones like 'Save and continue'.

demo-scripts.title: Accessibility
demo-scripts.description: Use language that everyone can understand. Avoid overly complex instructions or insider jargon that exclude users.

prd-in-workflow.title: Review copy where it lives
prd-in-workflow.subtitle: Works directly in your design and development workflow

live-prototyping.title: Review in Figma
live-prototyping.subtitle: Design integration
live-prototyping.description: Select any frame in Figma and get instant UX writing feedback. See which principles pass, which fail, and what to improve.

share-with-team.title: Review live web pages
share-with-team.subtitle: Browser extension
share-with-team.description: Open any web page and review the copy in context. Perfect for QA processes and ongoing content audits.

spec-features.title: Why teams struggle with UX writing
spec-features.subtitle: If your interface copy feels inconsistent or confusing, it's often not because the writers aren't good. It's because the process isn't built to support good writing.

automated-context.title: Copy written too late
automated-context.description: Microcopy is often added after design decisions are made. Chordio brings writing into the design process, so you can catch and fix wording issues early.

product-screen-analysis.title: No shared guardrails
product-screen-analysis.description: Tone and terminology drift across products and features. Chordio applies consistent rules for language, tone, and voice across your product.

knowledge-hub.title: Context gets lost
knowledge-hub.description: Copy is reviewed in docs or spreadsheets, not inside the design. Chordio reviews words where they appear â€” inside Figma frames or live web pages.

works-where.title: Available in your workspace
works-where.subtitle: Use Chordio wherever you design and build. In Figma, in the browser, or on the web.

slack.description: Add Chordio to Figma for seamless design review integration
